Title: 68981-EM - Add District-Based Search to Election Measures Search Page

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-requisite: Valid District (State or Federal only)with a election measure added to it\n

Navigate to EM - Elections- Public Measures-Election Measures
Search
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n Election Measures Search Page must be displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify District drop down is added to the search fields
Test Steps.Step Expected:
District drop down must be added to the Election Measures Search
Page

Test Steps.Step Action:
Select a district from the "District" drop down and
 click "Search"
Select a record from the search results and click on the "Action" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: View,Edit and Delete options must be displayed
View Election Measure Page must be displayed
View Election Measure Page must be editable

Are you sure to delete the Election Measure ?Click 
ok to continue Otherwise click Cancel  button 
message must be displayed2.Cancel and OK buttons must be displayed on the 
 pop up message
